Meteor.Graphics.Sprites

Class SpriteManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Meteor.Graphics.Sprites.SpriteManager

  • public class SpriteManager
extends java.lang.Object
    SpriteManager is a sprite handler class.
    This class is used to grab a sprite-sheet and split it up into individual sprite's.

                  int index)

        key - The lower-cased key attached to the sprite.

        Method used to add a sprite to the SPRITE_MAP.
        Parameters:
        key - The lower-cased key attached to the sprite.
        x - The x-coordinate of the sprite.
        y - The y-coordinate of the sprite.
        cellWidth - The width of the cell.
        cellHeight - The height of the cell.

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String key,
                Tuple2i... locArray)
        Method used to add a sprite to the SPRITE_MAP.
        Parameters:
        key - The lower-cased key attached to the sprite.
        locArray - The array of locations (x, y) of sprite's in the Spritesheet > (Bitmap).

      • generateAnimation

        public Animation generateAnimation(int duration,
                                   Sprite... spriteArray)
        Method used to generate an animation given an array of sprites.
        Parameters:
        duration - Time in milliseconds to be applied to all generated frames.
        spriteArray - The list of sprites to animation.
        Returns:
        Generated action with specified cells and provided time for all frames.
